job.title: Sr. Software Developer
job.description: ltstronggtLocationltstronggt Remote USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCompany ltstronggtzyBooksltbrgtltbrgtAt Wiley we welcome you for who you are the background you bring and embrace individuals who get excited about learning whether online or by book Learning is for everyone and so is our workplace Bring your experiences your perspectives and your passion Its in our differences that we empower the way the world learnsltbrgtltbrgtHave a passion for making a difference in the education careers and lives of hundreds of thousands of collegelevel students zyBooks a Wiley brand produces interactive online learning content that replaces collegelevel textbooks homework and even programming lab assignments We offer the excitement of a young energetic startup environment with a masterfully engineered platform and highdemand content for the STEM college market We are dedicated to the success of college students worldwide having provided courseware to more than 450000 students in over 600 universitiesltbrgtltbrgtLooking for a full stack software developer with an emphasis on creating pleasant user experience for the web This person will be expected to work alongside a team of developers designer and product managers to deliver new features and updates to existing ones for users of all types across multiple applicationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtHow you will make an impactltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtCompleted bachelors degree in Computer science software engineering or related field ltligtltligtExperience in Javascript HTML CSS and creating applications for the web ltligtltligtAbility to build servers that communicate with a consumer web application and database ltligtltligtFamiliarity with git docker RESTful server APIs mySQL database or similar ltligtltligtPassion for developing great user experiences through writing well organized and documented code ltligtltligtStrong work ethic and motivation to learn ltligtltligtWorks well in a remote setting able to stay engaged and communicative with others across distance ltligtltligtAble to adapt by moving across multiple features within our applications and to troubleshootsolve problems as needed ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWe are looking for people wholtbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtJavascript frameworks ReactVueEmber  Emberjs preferred ltligtltligtSASS tailwind ltligtltligtPythonFlask API development ltligtltligtFamiliarity with frontend accessibility best practices ltligtltligtExperience writing javascript automated tests with QunitJunit ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout WileyltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are in one of the most dynamic periods in our history as technology globalism and economic diversity create farreaching changes in the world As a learning business Wiley makes meaningful contributions to research discovery and lifelong learning by helping organizations achieve their goals and people achieve success from education through their career We may have been founded over two centuries ago but our secret to success remains the same change with the times and adapt to meet the everevolving needs of our customers The companys headquarters are located in
